com.irurueta.server.commons.email

Class MailConfigurationFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.irurueta.server.commons.configuration.BaseConfigurationFactory<MailConfiguration>
      • com.irurueta.server.commons.email.MailConfigurationFactory

  • public class MailConfigurationFactory
extends com.irurueta.server.commons.configuration.BaseConfigurationFactory<MailConfiguration>
    Class in charge of loading and configuring the email sending layer.

      • AWS_MAIL_CHECK_QUOTA_AFTER_MILLIS_PROPERTY

        public static final String AWS_MAIL_CHECK_QUOTA_AFTER_MILLIS_PROPERTY
        Property indicating time in milliseconds to wait to check sending quota. This is used to avoid Amazon SES throttling when sending large amounts of emails.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values
